name: Luxury Garden Villa
description: A stunning 5-bedroom villa with landscaped gardens, infinity pool, and panoramic mountain views. Features smart home technology and premium finishes throughout.

name: Modern City Apartment
description: Contemporary 3-bedroom apartment in the heart of downtown. Floor-to-ceiling windows, open-plan living, and access to rooftop terrace with city views.

name: Seaside Beach House
description: Beautiful beachfront property with 4 bedrooms, private beach access, and stunning ocean views. Perfect for those seeking a coastal lifestyle.

name: Executive Penthouse Suite
description: Luxurious penthouse with 360-degree city views, private elevator, chef's kitchen, and expansive terrace. The epitome of urban sophistication.

name: Family Estate Home
description: Spacious 6-bedroom estate on 2 acres of manicured grounds. Features home theater, wine cellar, and resort-style outdoor entertaining area.

name: Corporate Office Complex
description: Premium commercial space with modern amenities, conference facilities, and flexible floor plans. Ideal for growing businesses seeking prestige.
